home.description: I am a passionate software developer with a focus on creating innovative and efficient solutions. My expertise lies in web development, and I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Throughout my career, I’ve developed both technical and interpersonal skills that allow me to adapt to various challenges.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Every stage of my professional journey has been an opportunity to learn, collaborate, and create value. In this section, I share the projects and roles that have shaped my path in software development.

positions.description: Developed the company website using Next.js. Additionally, I developed and maintained the Wormhole Portal Token Bridge, a blockchain-based cross-chain bridge project that includes the Wormhole Connect widget, primarily using Vite and React.
Focused on web development for the Algo Explorer, a React-based application for exploring blockchain transactions and data on the Algorand network.
Developed web solutions for the Shareity project, utilizing Vue, Yii2, JavaScript, CSS3, and HTML5. And contributed to the development of Ozone, implementing features using React and Three.js.
Managed Oracle relational databases and developed mobile applications with Ionic, as well as web applications with Angular and a NoSQL database.
Assisted in teaching the “Algorithms and Programming” course, covering fundamental programming concepts.

education.title: Education & Certificates
education.description: I hold a degree in Computer Science and have complemented my education with continuous learning in web development. I believe education is a key tool to adapt, grow, and evolve as a professional.

titles.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
titles.description: During my studies at the Central University of Venezuela, I gained a strong foundation in computer science, covering areas such as programming, data structures, human-computer interaction, databases, and computer graphics. This academic journey strengthened both my technical skills and my critical thinking, preparing me to solve complex problems in a structured and analytical way. It also sparked a deep passion for software development and a commitment to continuous learning in an ever-evolving tech landscape.

titles.title: Git + GitHub for Open Source Collaboration
titles.description: Learned the fundamentals of Git and GitHub, including how to push code changes, create and merge branches, fork repositories, and submit pull requests to contribute effectively to open source projects.

titles.title: Visual Elements of User Interface Design
titles.description: This course explored the essential visual components of user interface design and examined the broader question of what an interface is, along with the designer’s role in shaping intuitive and effective user experiences.

contact.title: Contact me!
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or learning more about my work? I’m open to new opportunities and professional connections. Let’s talk!
contact.name: Name

projects.title: Projects & Demos
projects.description: Here you'll find a selection of the projects and demos I've worked on. Each one showcases my skills and how I apply my knowledge to create functional and innovative solutions.

list.description: A website to show all my work, skills, and a simple way to contact me.
